snippet: As Clayton Kendrick-Holmes prepares for Afghanistan, his football team at Maritime College in the Bronx is off to its best start.

headline.main: Without Hesitation, Coach Is Set to Deploy

snippet: Apple's value continues to surge past that of Microsoft, while Dell, of all companies, has secured more patents than Apple in recent years.
abstract: Apple's value continues to surge past that of Microsoft, while Dell, of all companies, has secured more patents than Apple in recent years.

headline.main: By the Numbers: Apple, Microsoft, Dell, H.P.

snippet: The Literati is a new low-cost e-reader with a color screen. Is it better than its similarly-priced black-and-white competitors?
abstract: The Literati is a new low-cost e-reader with a color screen. Is it better than its similarly-priced black-and-white competitors?

headline.main: Hands-On with the New Literati E-Reader

snippet: William J. Patterson, a prominent San Francisco investor and philanthropist who led the effort to revitalize the California Academy of Sciences, died on Friday. He was 48 and had suffered from a brain tumor.
abstract: William J. Patterson, a prominent San Francisco investor and philanthropist who led the effort to revitalize the California Academy of Sciences, died on Friday. He was 48 and had suffered from a brain tumor.

headline.main: Bill Patterson, Investor and Philanthropist, Dies

snippet: Kno, a start-up backed by Marc Andreessen, unveiled its second tablet aimed at college students, months before its first tablet will ship.

snippet: Research In Motion, the Canadian maker of the BlackBerry smartphone, introduced its first tablet computer on Monday at a developers’ conference in San Francisco. But in a return to its roots, the company said that the new device, the BlackBe...
abstract: Research In Motion, the Canadian maker of the BlackBerry smartphone, introduced its first tablet computer on Monday at a developers’ conference in San Francisco. But in a return to its roots, the company said that the new device, the BlackBerry PlayBook, would be aimed mainly at business users.

headline.main: With Tablet, R.I.M. Returns to Corporate User Base
